attr.title: Golden Warden
attr.desc: A rogue-like battle game with easy controls. Pick a card each turn, get upgrades, collect gold to strengthen your weapons, take down (or avoid) enemies as you aim for the dungeon depths and attempt to claim the treasure that Golden Warden is said to guard.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game on Steam. Install port files.
Place the Steam game files into ports/goldenwarden/assets.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2851110/Golden_Warden/). Install port files.
Place the Steam game files into ports/goldenwarden/assets.
